name: OMSI Vehicle Configuration File
summary: File created by OMSI The Bus Simulator, an omnibus driving simulation program; similar to other OMSI configuration files like .HUM , .SLI , .SCO , and .BUS files; holds configuration data for vehicles, such as their appearance, that interact on the road with the bus during gameplay; can be customized.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: MR Software OMSI The Bus Simulator 2
